title: Farm Drainage System Installation
scope: Complete field drainage system across 45 acres of agricultural land
outcome: Improved land productivity by 40% and eliminated seasonal waterlogging issues
description: Installed comprehensive drainage system including main drains, laterals, and outfall management. Work completed during optimal weather window with minimal disruption to farming operations.

title: Agricultural Building Groundworks
scope: Groundworks and foundations for new 2,000 sq ft agricultural storage building
outcome: Delivered on time and budget with reinforced concrete base ready for steel frame erection
description: Complete site preparation including excavation, drainage, and reinforced concrete base. Coordinated with building contractor for seamless project delivery.

title: Boundary Fencing Project
scope: 2.5km of stock fencing and gates across mixed terrain
outcome: Secure boundary established with improved livestock management and reduced maintenance needs
description: Installed high-quality stock fencing with treated posts, including 8 field gates. Work included challenging terrain and coordination with neighboring properties.

title: Site Clearance & Demolition
scope: Demolition of old farm buildings and complete site clearance
outcome: Site cleared and leveled ready for residential development with 95% waste recycled
description: Safe demolition of redundant farm buildings followed by site clearance and leveling. Comprehensive waste management with maximum recycling achieved.

title: Farm Access Road Construction
scope: 500m all-weather access road with drainage and hardcore base
outcome: Year-round access achieved for heavy agricultural vehicles and deliveries
description: Constructed durable access road with proper drainage and compacted hardcore base. Designed to handle heavy agricultural machinery in all weather conditions.

title: Livestock Yard Construction
scope: New concrete livestock yard with drainage and feed storage area
outcome: Modern facility improving animal welfare and operational efficiency
description: Complete livestock yard with reinforced concrete, integrated drainage system, and feed storage. Designed for easy cleaning and excellent animal welfare standards.

title: Land Leveling & Improvement
scope: 25 acres of land leveling and topsoil management
outcome: Improved field usability and crop yields with better water management
description: Precision land leveling with careful topsoil management. Work improved field drainage and created more uniform growing conditions across the site.

title: Residential Extension Groundworks
scope: Groundworks for large residential extension including foundations and drainage
outcome: Quality foundations delivered to building control standards, ready for construction
description: Professional groundworks including excavation, drainage connections, and concrete foundations. Work completed efficiently with minimal disruption to occupied property.
